widget_drawer_description: Show or hide widgets you would like to display in Vitals
vitals_settings_description: Tailor your dashboard's look to boost your workflow
update_tz_description: This will affect how time is displayed in the app
no_active_meetings: No current active meetings are scheduled at this time
no_direct_msgs: It looks like you have no direct messages at the moment. Please check back later
no_org_employees: There are no employees in the organization yet
no_filtered_employees: No employees found for the selected filter, please try a different filter
no_notifs: It looks like you have no notifications at the moment. Please check back later!
create_thread_error: Failed to get or create thread
no_pulses: No pulses yet. Create a pulse to get started.
no_saved_msgs: It looks like you have no saved messages at the moment. Save messages to see them here.
no_tasks: It looks like you have no tasks at the moment. Please check back later!
no_unread_msgs: It looks like you have no new unread messages at the moment. Please check back later!
no_widget_permissions: It looks like you're signed in as a guest, so you don't have permission to add widgets just yet.
request_access: Reach out to your organization's admin to get access â€” they'll get you sorted in no time!
no_widget_added: It looks like you haven't added any widgets to your dashboard.
add_new_widget_prompt: Get started by adding one now to customize your experience!
invite_pulse_to_meeting: Invite Pulse to the meeting that is currently in progress.
no_meetings_matched_search: No meetings matched your search. Try adjusting your keywords or filters. Need help finding something? Make sure your calendar is connected!
no_meetings_scheduled: It looks like you don't have any meetings scheduled yet. Why not add a meeting to kick things off? You can also connect your Google Calendar for easy access!
no_meetings: It looks like you don't have any meetings scheduled yet in your Google Calendar.
automatically_invited_to_this_meeting: Pulse will be automatically invited to this meeting.
recurring_description: If this meeting is recurring, Pulse will join all future instances. (Only available with a linked calendar)
